name: Robot Rewind
description:
Get the robot to the exit using the platforms, and the robot itself. Place the robot's head on the level wherever you are, but rewind to the start when you do.

Controls are arrow keys, and the space bar.

All sprites, and sounds were made by me.

This game is quite bad, so don't expect much from it. It is also the first game I have made. You can also mute the sounds in the settings menu.
